title: Eldritch Invocations
content:
r of Flesh - Available at level 7 Minions of Chaos - Available at level 9 Otherworldly Leap - Available at level 9 Whispers of the Grave - Available at level 9 Lifedrinker - Available at level 12.

How to unlock Eldritch Invocations

Eldritch Invocations can be acquired for the first time byWarlock Lv 2. Then it becomes available again at level 5, 7, 9 and 12.

Eldritch Invocations Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here You may not change an old Invocation when you level up. Make sure to choose one
